verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> when they had <S%G1353>traveled<s%> <S%G1353>through<s%> <S%G295>Amphipolis<s%> and <S%G624>Apollonia,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> there was a <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>

And <S%G2596>according<s%> to Paul's <S%G1486>custom,<s%> he <S%G1525>went<s%> to them, and for <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4521>Sabbaths<s%> <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with them from the <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%>

<S%G1272>explaining<s%> and <S%G3908>giving<s%> <S%G3908>evidence<s%> that the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1163>had<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%> and <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and [saying,] <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I am <S%G2605>proclaiming<s%> to you is the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>"

And <S%G5100>some<s%> of them were <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> and <S%G4345>joined<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas,<s%> <S%G5037>along<s%> with a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the God-fearing <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> and a <S%G3756>number<s%> <S%G3641><s%> of the <S%G4413>leading<s%> <S%G1135>women.<s%>

But the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2206>becoming<s%> <S%G2206>jealous<s%> and <S%G4355>taking<s%> <S%G4355>along<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> from the <S%G60>market<s%> <S%G60>place,<s%> <S%G3792>formed<s%> a <S%G3792>mob<s%> and <S%G2350>set<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> in an <S%G2350>uproar;<s%> and <S%G2186>coming<s%> upon the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G2394>Jason,<s%> they were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G4254>bring<s%> them out to the <S%G1218>people.<s%>

And when they did not <S%G2147>find<s%> them, they [began] <S%G4951>dragging<s%> <S%G2394>Jason<s%> and <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> the <S%G4173>city<s%> <S%G4173>authorities,<s%> <S%G994>shouting,<s%> <S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G3778>men<s%> who have <S%G387>upset<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> have <S%G3918>come<s%> <S%G1759>here<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%>

and <S%G2394>Jason<s%> has <S%G5264>welcomed<s%> them, and they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4238>act<s%> <S%G561>contrary<s%> to the <S%G1378>decrees<s%> of <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that there is <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> "
And they <S%G5015>stirred<s%> up the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> and the <S%G4173>city<s%> <S%G4173>authorities<s%> who <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>
And when they had <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G2425>pledge<s%> from <S%G2394>Jason<s%> and the <S%G3062>others,<s%> they <S%G630>released<s%> them.

And the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G1599>sent<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G1599>away<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%> to <S%G960>Berea;<s%> and when they <S%G3854>arrived,<s%> they <S%G549>went<s%> into the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> were <S%G2104>more<s%> noble-minded than <S%G3588>those<s%> in <S%G2332>Thessalonica,<s%> for they <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> with <S%G3956>great<s%> <S%G4288>eagerness,<s%> <S%G350>examining<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G2250><s%> [to see] <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> were <S%G3779>so.<s%>

<S%G4183>Many<s%> of them <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G2532>along<s%> with a <S%G3756>number<s%> <S%G3641><s%> of <S%G2158>prominent<s%> <S%G1674>Greek<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> and <S%G435>men.<s%>

But <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> of <S%G2332>Thessalonica<s%> <S%G1097>found<s%> out that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> had been <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> by <S%G3972>Paul<s%> in <S%G960>Berea<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2546>there<s%> <S%G2546>likewise,<s%> <S%G4531>agitating<s%> and <S%G5015>stirring<s%> up the <S%G3793>crowds.<s%>

And <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> out to <S%G4198>go<s%> as <S%G2193>far<s%> as the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and <S%G4609>Silas<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G5278>remained<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2525>conducted<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> him as <S%G2193>far<s%> as <S%G116>Athens;<s%> and <S%G2983>receiving<s%> a <S%G1785>command<s%> for <S%G4609>Silas<s%> and <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to him as <S%G5036>soon<s%> as <S%G5035>possible,<s%> they <S%G1826>departed.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> while <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G1551>waiting<s%> for them at <S%G116>Athens,<s%> his <S%G4151>spirit<s%> was being <S%G3947>provoked<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> him as he was <S%G2334>beholding<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2712>full<s%> of <S%G2712>idols.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> he was <S%G1256>reasoning<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and the God-fearing [Gentiles,] and in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>place<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> with <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3909>happened<s%> to be <S%G3909>present.<s%>

And <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1946>Epicurean<s%> and <S%G4770>Stoic<s%> <S%G5386>philosophers<s%> were <S%G4820>conversing<s%> with him. And <S%G5100>some<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> would <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4691>idle<s%> <S%G4691>babbler<s%> <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%>?" <S%G3588>Others,<s%> <S%G1161><s%> "He <S%G1380>seems<s%> to be a <S%G2604>proclaimer<s%> of <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1140>deities,<s%>" â€“ <S%G3754>because<s%> he was <S%G2097>preaching<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and the <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

And they <S%G1949>took<s%> him and <S%G71>brought<s%> him to the <S%G697>Areopagus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1410>"May<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1322>teaching<s%> is which you are <S%G2980>proclaiming<s%>?

"For you are <S%G1533>bringing<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3579>strange<s%> <S%G3579>things<s%> to our <S%G189>ears;<s%> we <S%G1014>want<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2309>mean.<s%> <S%G1510><s%>"

<S%G1161>(Now<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G117>Athenians<s%> and the <S%G3581>strangers<s%> <S%G1927>visiting<s%> there used to <S%G2119>spend<s%> their <S%G2119>time<s%> in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3004>telling<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> <S%G2537>new.<s%>)

And <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> in the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G697>Areopagus<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G435>"Men<s%> of <S%G117>Athens,<s%> I <S%G2334>observe<s%> that you are <S%G7036>very<s%> <S%G7036>religious<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>respects.<s%>

"For while I was <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> and <S%G333>examining<s%> the <S%G4574>objects<s%> of your <S%G4574>worship,<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> an <S%G1041>altar<s%> with <S%G3739>this<s%> <S%G1924>inscription,<s%> 'TO AN <S%G57>UNKNOWN<s%> <S%G2316>GOD.<s%>' <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> you <S%G2151>worship<s%> in <S%G50>ignorance,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> I <S%G2605>proclaim<s%> to you.

"The <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> in it, since He is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth,<s%> does not <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in <S%G3485>temples<s%> <S%G5499>made<s%> with <S%G5499>hands;<s%>

<S%G3761>neither<s%> is He <S%G2323>served<s%> by <S%G442>human<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> as though He <S%G4326>needed<s%> <S%G5100>anything,<s%> since He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G1325>gives<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> and <S%G4157>breath<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things;<s%>

and He <S%G4160>made<s%> from <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> of <S%G444>mankind<s%> to <S%G2730>live<s%> on <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> having <S%G3724>determined<s%> [their] <S%G4367>appointed<s%> <S%G2540>times,<s%> and the <S%G3734>boundaries<s%> of their <S%G2733>habitation,<s%>

that they should <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>perhaps<s%> they might <S%G5584>grope<s%> for Him and <S%G2147>find<s%> Him, <S%G2532>though<s%> <S%G1065><s%> He is not <S%G3112>far<s%> from <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of us;

for in Him we <S%G2198>live<s%> and <S%G2795>move<s%> and <S%G1510>exist,<s%> as <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of your own <S%G4163>poets<s%> have <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'For we <S%G2532>also<s%> are His <S%G1085>offspring.<s%>'

<S%G5225>"Being<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> the <S%G1085>offspring<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> we <S%G3784>ought<s%> not to <S%G3543>think<s%> that the <S%G2304>Divine<s%> <S%G2304>Nature<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G696>silver<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> an <S%G5480>image<s%> <S%G5480>formed<s%> by the <S%G5078>art<s%> and <S%G1761>thought<s%> of <S%G444>man.<s%>

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> having <S%G5237>overlooked<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> of <S%G52>ignorance,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G518>declaring<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3837>everywhere<s%> should <S%G3340>repent,<s%>

<S%G2530>because<s%> He has <S%G2476>fixed<s%> a <S%G2250>day<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> a <S%G435>Man<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He has <S%G3724>appointed,<s%> having <S%G3930>furnished<s%> <S%G4102>proof<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men<s%> by <S%G450>raising<s%> Him from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%> "

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> [began] to <S%G5512>sneer,<s%> but <S%G3588>others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "We shall <S%G191>hear<s%> you <S%G2532>again<s%> <S%G3825><s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3778>this.<s%>"
<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out of their <S%G3319>midst.<s%>

But <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G2853>joined<s%> him and <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G1354>Dionysius<s%> the <S%G698>Areopagite<s%> and a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1152>Damaris<s%> and <S%G2087>others<s%> with them.
